shortdesc.ph: The configuration of the SDK log files.

p.codeblock: struct LogConfig { const char* filePath; uint32_t fileSizeInKB; LOG_LEVEL level; LogConfig() : filePath(NULL), fileSizeInKB(DEFAULT_LOG_SIZE_IN_KB), level(OPTIONAL_LOG_LEVEL_SPECIFIER LOG_LEVEL_INFO) {} };
export interface LogConfig { filePath: string, fileSize: number, level: LOG_LEVEL }

pd.p: The absolute path of the log files. Ensure that the directory for the log files exists and is writable. You can use this parameter to rename the log files.

The default file path is:
Android: /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<package name>/files/agorasdk.log
iOS: App Sandbox/Library/caches/agorasdk.log
macOS:
If Sandbox is enabled: App Sandbox/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log, for example, /Users/<username>/Library/Containers/<App Bundle Identifier>/Data/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log.
If Sandbox is disabled: ~/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log
Windows: C:\Users\<user_name>\AppData\Local\Agora\<process_name>\agorasdk.log。

plentry.pd: 单个 agorasdk.log 日志文件的大小，单位为 KB，取值范围为 [128,1024]，默认值为 1,024 KB。 如果你将 fileSizeInKByte 设为小于 128 KB，SDK 会自动调整到 128 KB；如果你将 fileSizeInKByte 设为大于 1,024 KB，SDK 会自动调整到 1,024 KB。

note.p: 该方法仅用于设置 agorasdk.log 文件的大小，对 agoraapi.log 不生效。

pd.p: The output level of the SDK log file. See .
For example, if you set the log level to WARN, the SDK outputs the logs within levels FATAL, ERROR, and WARN.
